name: Chespin

evolution.description: Chespin can evolve into Quilladin at level 6 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 6 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Spiny Nut Pokémon. The quills on its head are usually soft. When it flexes them, the points become so hard and sharp that they can pierce rock.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Bulletproof
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to damage from moves with Bullet, Ball, or Bomb in their name.
